author: gartung
body: This changes the tkonlinesw headers after install to change throw(*) to noexcept(false) as suggested by clang error : ISO C++1z does not allow dynamic exception specifications [-Wdynamic-exception-spec]
title: Fix tkonlinesw headers for clang error  ISO C++1z does not allow dynamic exception specifications [-Wdynamic-exception-spec]
